items.sentence: People who\'ve never been to Boston don\'t know what they\'re missing.
If you don\'t want to go to Tom\'s birthday party, you don\'t have to.
Tom asked me to do him a favor. However, I couldn\'t do what he asked.
Tom assured Mary that he\'d help her paint the ceiling of her kitchen.
Tom spent most days begging for money in front of tourist attractions.
Tom thought it would be fun to go visit John and Mary for the weekend.
Tom threw a big party at his house while his parents were on vacation.
We need apples, oranges, bread and peanut butter from the supermarket.
I don\'t think you need to tell Tom what Mary said she\'s going to do.
Mary stepped out of the bathroom with a towel wrapped around her body.
